name: unction
content:
unction noun
(MAKING HOLY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ U ]
  religion
  specialized the act of putting holy oil or water on someone in a religious ceremony, in order to make them holy or give them holy responsibilities : They were waiting for the priest to administer the sacrament of unction (last rites). Napoleon knelt to receive the triple unction from the Pope on head, arms, and hands.
